scripts.build:css: mkdir -p dist/css && tailwindcss -i ./css/input.css -o ./dist/css/style_compiled.css --minify && esbuild css/style.css css/style_dark.css css/h5p-editor.css --minify --outdir=dist/css
scripts.build:html: html-minifier-terser index.html -o dist/index.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true && html-minifier-terser advanced.html -o dist/advanced.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true
scripts.build:assets: cp -r advanced_libs h5p-preview-lib favicon.ico robots.txt sitemap.xml dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: run-s clean build:css build:js build:html build:assets
